definition: to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet

sentences.english: VSO will obtain your consent before contacting referees.
sentences.chinese: 在聯絡你的聯繫人之前我們會徵得你的同意。

sentences.english: But too much of a good thing isn't the only problem with contact management programs today.
sentences.chinese: 過猶不及不僅僅只是目前聯繫人管理程序的唯一問題。

sentences.english: Viewing contact information and tracking ongoing conversations are de-emphasized.
sentences.chinese: 查看聯繫人信息和跟蹤正在進行的會話功能被弱化。

sentences.english: And you can click the button of detail info to see the contacter's detail info.
sentences.chinese: 並且您能點擊細節按鈕信息看聯繫人的細節信息。

sentences.english: Act as a link person for this big team with other depts.
sentences.chinese: 作爲部門聯繫人與其他部門溝通。

sentences.english: Who is the main contact at Coles Myer regarding the Ethical Sourcing Code?
sentences.chinese: 在道德採購準則方面，高斯美雅誰是主要聯繫人？

sentences.english: We now retrieve this contact to make the updates.
sentences.chinese: 現在我們檢索此聯繫人以便進行更新。

sentences.english: Improved Bluetooth phone book transfer of contacts to in-vehicle Bluetooth solutions.
sentences.chinese: 改善聯繫人藍牙電話簿轉移至車載藍牙解決方案。

sentences.english: The software can search all of the contacter info as your word.
sentences.chinese: 軟件可能搜尋所有聯繫人名單信息。

sentences.english: Send emails to groups of contacts or distribution lists.
sentences.chinese: 將電子郵件發送到聯繫人或通訊組列表的羣體。

sentences.english: Contact information is presented in a card-like UI, making it easier for users to read and edit contacts.
sentences.chinese: 聯繫人信息用卡片界面展示，便於用戶閱讀和編輯。

sentences.english: Civicrm, how to export contacts with custom fields?
sentences.chinese: 如何導出自定義域的聯繫人嗎？

sentences.english: The contact name and company name are correct.
sentences.chinese: 聯繫人姓名和公司名稱是正確的。

sentences.english: If possible, also make a copy of your buddy- or contact-list.
sentences.chinese: 也備份你的好友或聯繫人列表。

sentences.english: Now, how about adding new contacts?
sentences.chinese: 現在，如何添加新聯繫人呢？

definition: to display/to exhibit/to bring out implicit or innate qualities/to express (a thought or moral)/to develop (an idea)/to elaborate (on a theme)
Greater Bay Area, established in 2017, consisting of Hong Kong, Macao and nine cities in Guangdong (abbr. for 粵港澳大灣區|粤港澳大湾区[Yue4 Gang3 Ao4 Da4 wan1 Qu1])
one's conduct/deed/activity/accomplishment/achievement/to act as/as (in the capacity of)/qua/to view as/to look upon (sth as)/to take sth to be
Belt and Road Initiative, Chinese government plan to provide finance and engineering expertise to build infrastructure across Eurasia and northeast Africa, unveiled in 2013
